de.mrapp.android.dialog.adapter

Interface RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.MultipleChoiceMode, RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.NoChoiceMode, RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.SingleChoiceMode
    Enclosing class:
    RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

    public static interface RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode
    Defines the interface, a choice mode, which manages the selection state of list items, must implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isItemChecked(int position)
      Returns, whether the list item at a specific position is currently selected, or not.
      boolean setItemChecked(int position, boolean checked)
      Sets whether the list item at a specific position should be selected, or not.

    • Method Detail

      • isItemChecked

        boolean isItemChecked(int position)
        Returns, whether the list item at a specific position is currently selected, or not.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the list item, whose selection state should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        True, if the list item is selected, false otherwise

      • setItemChecked

        boolean setItemChecked(int position,
                       boolean checked)
        Sets whether the list item at a specific position should be selected, or not.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the list item, whose selection state should be changed, as an Integer value
        checked - True, if the list item should be selected, false otherwise
        Returns:
        True, if the selection of the list item has been changed, false otherwise
